segments.text: The woman stands there, blissfully unaware of the chaos unraveling in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's sweet, her focus so singular on drying that plate, a routine in her day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then, I notice the water, pouring relentlessly over the edge—it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s little fingers are diving deep into the cookie jar, his excitement palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can’t shake my nerves as he stretches precariously on that stool; will he fall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is so eager, and it’s almost heartbreaking to think of what could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching this unfold, I feel a mix of emotions, laughter battling anxiety in equal measure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The neat garden outside only emphasizes the craziness happening just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment filled with innocence, yet a sense of foreboding hangs in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could freeze time just to give them a moment of clarity, but all I can do is watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
